name: Pixel Hero：Infinity War
description:
Summon powerful fighters, start stimulating battle!
Training your warriors, wearing equipment and improve their ability to defeat your arduous enemies in journey;
Diverse team of fighters, arrange their formations，customize your super team;
Beautiful and powerful skills bring you refreshing visual enjoyment;
Join guild to meet more partners during the journey;
Exciting adventure, bring you an immersive experience;
Abundant task rewards to facilitate your journey;
Play this game, write your story in a fantasy world and become new legend!
